text: Robert Zero Karl Oskar Broberg (2 July 1940 â€“ 21 July 2015) was a Swedish singer, composer and artist. In 1989 he received "Karamelodiktstipendiet" Award. Broberg died in Stockholm, Sweden from Parkinson's disease, aged 75. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website * Category:1940 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Swedish composers Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease Category:Disease-related deaths in Sweden Category:Swedish singers
